verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> the <S%G4262>sheep<s%> <S%G2076>gate,<s%> there is a <S%G2861>pool,<s%> which is <S%G1951>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G964>"Bethesda,<s%>" <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4745>porches.<s%>

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> <S%G4128>a<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G770>those<s%> who were <S%G5185>sick,<s%> blind, <S%G5560>lame,<s%> or <S%G3584>paralyzed,<s%> waiting <S%G1551>for<s%> the <S%G2796>moving<s%> of the <S%G5204>water;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> went <S%G2597>down<s%> at <S%G2596>certain<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2861>pool,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5015>stirred<s%> up the <S%G5204>water.<s%> <S%G3588>Whoever<s%> <S%G3767>stepped<s%> in <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5016>stirring<s%> <S%G3553>of<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G3553>of<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1221>whatever<s%> <S%G3553>disease<s%> he <S%G2722>had.<s%>

<S%G1492>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G2621>lying<s%> <S%G2532>there,<s%> and <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G2192>been<s%> sick <S%G2235>for<s%> a <S%G4183>long<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> he <S%G3004>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "Do <S%G2309>you<s%> want to be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>well?<s%>"

The sick <S%G770>man<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Sir,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G444>one<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2861>pool<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> is <S%G5015>stirred<s%> <S%G1161>up,<s%> but <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>while<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>'m <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> steps <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>"

<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him who was <S%G2323>cured,<s%> "It <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%> It <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G4671>you<s%> to <S%G142>carry<s%> the <S%G2895>mat.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he who was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> it <S%G2076>was,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1593>withdrawn,<s%> a <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5117>place.<s%>

<S%G3326%G99999>Afterward<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> you are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>well.<s%> <S%G264>Sin<s%> no <S%G3371>more,<s%> <S%G3361>so<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5100>nothing<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> <S%G1096>happens<s%> to <S%G4671>you.<s%>"

The <S%G444>man<s%> went <S%G565>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G312>told<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> who had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5199>well.<s%>

<S%G5124>For<s%> <S%G3767>this<s%> cause <S%G5124>therefore<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> all the <S%G3123>more<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3089>he<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3089>broke<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> own <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2470>equal<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G5368>affection<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1166>shows<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4160>does.<s%> He will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> than <S%G5130>these,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> may <S%G2296>marvel.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1453>raises<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gives them <S%G2227>life,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> also gives <S%G2227>life<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2309>desires.<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> they <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%> He who <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G281>"Most<s%> <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3754>you,<s%> he <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> has <S%G3327>passed<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G281>Most<s%> <S%G281>certainly,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3754>you,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> will <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G5456>voice;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G191>hear<s%> will <S%G2198>live.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> also to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> will come <S%G1607>out;<s%> those who have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> those who have <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G5337>evil,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> I <S%G191>hear,<s%> I <S%G2919>judge,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1342>righteous;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> which <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%> <S%G235>However,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> may be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than that of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G5048>accomplish,<s%> the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

<S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G1380><s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%> There <S%G2076>is<s%> one who <S%G2723>accuses<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> even <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> have set your <S%G1679>hope.<s%>
